bacterial_genome_tree.name: optional_genome_ids
bacterial_genome_tree.label: Optional Genome Ids
bacterial_genome_tree.help: Optional genomes (not penalized for missing genes) (optional)

bacterial_genome_tree.name: number_of_genes
bacterial_genome_tree.label: Number Of Genes
bacterial_genome_tree.help: Desired number of genes for analysis (default: 20)

bacterial_genome_tree.name: max_genomes_missing
bacterial_genome_tree.label: Max Genomes Missing
bacterial_genome_tree.help: Max main genomes missing from any PGFam (default: 0)

bacterial_genome_tree.name: max_allowed_dups
bacterial_genome_tree.label: Max Allowed Dups
bacterial_genome_tree.help: Max duplications allowed for main genomes (default: 0)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: srr_ids
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Srr Ids
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: SRA Run IDs - array of strings (optional)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: recipe
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Recipe
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Assembly algorithm (auto, unicycler, flye, meta-flye, canu, spades, meta-spades, plasmid-spades, single-cell, megahit)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: genome_size
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Genome Size
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Expected genome size in base pairs (optional)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: racon_iter
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Racon Iter
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Number of Racon polishing iterations (optional, integer)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: pilon_iter
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Pilon Iter
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Number of Pilon polishing iterations (optional, integer)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: min_contig_len
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Min Contig Len
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Minimum contig length to retain (optional, integer)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: min_contig_cov
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Min Contig Cov
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Minimum contig coverage to retain (optional, integer)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: filtlong
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Filtlong
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Use Filtlong for read filtering (optional, boolean)

comprehensive_genome_analysis.name: target_depth
comprehensive_genome_analysis.label: Target Depth
comprehensive_genome_analysis.help: Target read depth for subsampling (optional, integer)

date.name: output_path
date.label: Output Path
date.help: The path for the output files (required)

date.name: output_file
date.label: Output File
date.help: The name of the output file (required)

docking.name: top_n
docking.label: Top N
docking.help: Number of top results to return (optional)

expression_import.name: xfile
expression_import.label: Xfile
expression_import.help: Experiment data file with comparison values (required)

genome_assembly.name: options
genome_assembly.label: Options
genome_assembly.help: auto, unicycler, flye, meta-flye, canu, spades, meta-spades, plasmid-spades, single-cell, megahit

metagenomic_binning.name: skip_indexing
metagenomic_binning.label: Skip Indexing
metagenomic_binning.help: Don't index bins in Solr (default: False)

msa_snp_analysis.name: feature_groups
msa_snp_analysis.label: Feature Groups
msa_snp_analysis.help: Feature group selection (optional) - **MUST be a list of workspace paths** (e.g., ["/USERNAME/home/Feature Groups/group_name1", "/USERNAME/home/Feature Groups/group_name2"])

primer_design.name: SEQUENCE_INCLUDED_REGION
primer_design.label: Sequence Included Region
primer_design.help: Region where primers can be picked (optional)

primer_design.name: PRIMER_NUM_RETURN
primer_design.label: Primer Num Return
primer_design.help: Max number of primer pairs to report (optional)

primer_design.name: PRIMER_PAIR_MAX_DIFF_TM
primer_design.label: Primer Pair Max Diff Tm
primer_design.help: Max Tm difference of paired primers (optional)

rnaseq.name: single_end_libs

rnaseq.help: Single-end read libraries with sample IDs (optional)

sars_wastewater_analysis.label: Paired End Libs
sars_wastewater_analysis.help: Paired-end read libraries with sample metadata (optional)

sars_wastewater_analysis.label: Single End Libs
sars_wastewater_analysis.help: Single-end read libraries with sample metadata (optional)
